subs.text: Gosh, this was a good movie. We expected flying cars and replicators, and instead the future couldn’t even muster up a good satire (Don’t Look Up is a pale copy). [link]

subs.text: To this I would add: replace "scientists" with "physicians" and "science" with "patient care" and the statement holds true. [link]

subs.text: “We can’t keep making so many scientists tear out their hair over well-intentioned but near-infinite administrative requirements, as if that doesn’t distract from the actual science that they are supposed to be doing.” Yes! [link]
subs.rawText:
